column1: But the ACA was never perfect

column1: The ACA also lowered prescription drug costs for 12 million seniors
column2: and allowed young people to stay on their parents plan. And its eliminated lifetime limits on benefits that often put people in a jam.

column1: Because so many people made sacrifices and some members of Congress took courageous votes
column2: we got the ACA across the finish line. Now
column3: more than 30 million Americans have health coverage
column4: and 135 million Americans with pre-existing conditions cant be dropped or denied coverage.
